headline: ExxonMobil Balances Fife Closure With Growing US Carbon Capture Business
summary: ExxonMobil (NYSE:XOM) is permanently closing its Fife Ethylene Plant in Scotland, with decommissioning to follow and significant implications for local jobs and the surrounding community. At the same time, ExxonMobil has started commercial operations at its first carbon capture and storage project with CF Industries in Louisiana, reflecting a shift in its global asset mix and emissions management efforts. For you as an investor, these moves sit at the intersection of ExxonMobil's...
